question: What are the recent trends in IT spending and technology adoption among companies in the healthcare industry?

subtasks.task: Retrieve companies operating in the healthcare industry and their respective IT budgets over the last year.
Identify recent contracts and deals related to technology services in the healthcare sector to analyze spending patterns.
Gather data on technology focus areas and strategic initiatives of healthcare companies to understand technology adoption trends.
Analyze historical hiring data in technology roles within healthcare companies to assess how talent demand correlates with IT spending trends.
Examine social media posts and engagement metrics from healthcare companies to evaluate their public interaction regarding new technologies and initiatives.
